ChunkQuadTree Class Reference

This class implements a quad tree for outdoor chunks it is used to quickly determine what chunks are visible. More...

#include <chunk_quad_tree.hpp>

Detailed Description

This class implements a quad tree for outdoor chunks it is used to quickly determine what chunks are visible.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ChunkQuadTree::ChunkQuadTree ( uint32  token  ) 

ChunkQuadTree constructor.

Parameters:
token the token for this quad tree which is the x/z grid position of this quad tree

std::vector< Chunk * > &  chunkList 
)

Calculate the visible chunks.

Parameters:
viewProjection the projection matrix used to determine if a chunk is visible
chunkList the list of chunks to fill in with visible chunks

float ChunkQuadTree::distanceToPoint ( const Vector3 &  point  ) 

This method calculates the distance from a point to the top quad tree node.

Returns:
the distance to the point

This method removes a chunk from the quad tree.

Returns:
true if this quad tree still has data in it

void ChunkQuadTree::setTraverseOrder ( const Vector3 &  viewDirection  )  [static]

This method sets the traverse order for a quad tree based on a viewing direction, this is used to output the chunks in a rough front to back order.

Parameters:
viewDirection viewing direction
